@startuml
title 00-login_basic

actor "User" as us
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d

entity "<link:_>model : Model" as m
control "<link:_>: AccountSystem" as as
participant "<link:_>: AdministratorRepository" as ar
participant "<link:_>: ConsumerRepository" as cr
participant "<link:_>: OrganizerRepository" as or
participant "<link:_>: AccountService" as u
==1.The user opens the application.\n2.The system presents a login page and prompt the user to enter their email and password (00-login)\n3.The user enters their credentials.==
us->>w:interact
activate w
w->d:POST(url: String, payload : json)

activate d
alt The account type is an administrator account

  d->as: login(email: String, password: String model: Model)
  activate as

  as -> u: AdministratorAccount :=   getAdministratorAccount(email:String)
  activate u
    note right of as: 3.The system passes requests to the service.

  u->ar: e:=findByEmail(email: Long): Administrator


  u --> as :return e
  deactivate u

  as->m:addAttributes("administrator":String a:Administrator)

  as-->d : return "main_page_administrator"
  deactivate as
  d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv

  nv-->d:
  deactivate nv
  d-->w:return newView

==4. The system displays the main page of the system (01-main_page_administrator.png)==
    end
alt The account type is an customer account

  d->as: login(email: String, password: String, model: Model)
  activate as

  as -> u: CustomerAccount :=   getConsumerAccount(email:String)
  activate u
    note right of as: 3.The system passes requests to the service.


  u->cr:e:= findByEmail(email: Long): Customer
  u --> as :return e
  deactivate u
  as->m:addAttributes("customer":String c: Customer)

  as-->d : return "main_page_customer"
  deactivate as
  d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv

  nv-->d:
  deactivate nv
  d-->w:return newView
==4. The system displays the main page of the system (34-main_page_customer.png))==
    end
alt The account type is an organizer account

  d->as: login(email: String, password: String, model: Model)
  activate as
  as -> u: OrganizerAccount :=   getOrganizerAccount(email:String)
  activate u
    note right of as: 3.The system passes requests to the service.

  u->or:e:= findByEmail(email: Long): Organizer


  u --> as :return e
  deactivate u
  as->m:addAttributes("organiser":String o:Organiser)

  as-->d : return "main_page_organizer"
  deactivate as
  d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv

  nv-->d:
  deactivate nv
  d-->w:return newView
  deactivate d
==4. The system displays the main page of the system (17-main_page_organizer.png)==
    end
@enduml
